statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 103;
SELECT MAX(interaction_date) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT interaction_details, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_type ASC
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_interaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, last_interaction_date FROM customers ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT interaction_description, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email Interaction' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, last_interaction_date FROM customers ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, interaction_description FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date, email FROM customers;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT pattern_type, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_name, email, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id
SELECT pattern_type, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY pattern_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, segment_name, segment_criteria FROM segments;
SELECT pattern_type, pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id = 3
SELECT interactions.interaction_id, interactions.customer_id, customers.name FROM interactions JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.id
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM segments

SELECT behavior_patterns.pattern_id, behavior_patterns.customer_id, customers.name, behavior_patterns.pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns JOIN customers ON behavior_patterns.customer_id = customers.id
